website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, comfortable shower cap with two layers to lock out moisture.
pros: Double layered to keep moisture out
cons: The shower cap tends to run small

customer_reviews.title: Looking good in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This adorable shower cap fits perfectly and is lined. It is so cute looking too.. And it does the job of keeping your hair dry
customer_reviews.author: dog eared

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Originally chose item because of the price, expected it to be cheesy because it was satin. I love it! Well made, works great. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap runs extremely small. If you put your hair up in a messy bun before using this shower cap it will not fit at all. The shower cap feels really thin also.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Snyder

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously keeps hair dry! Best shower cap I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah May

customer_reviews.title: Good elastic, I actually use it as a bicycle ...
customer_reviews.text: Good elastic, I actually use it as a bicycle seat cover to keep my seat dry while the bike is sitting outside in the rain. Makes it easy to find my bike among dozens of bicycles!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright, happy color! It does the job of keeping my hair dry well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful satin shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I just love the fit and tightness from this cap. I'm a natural with a lot of hair. I'm very please with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Angie B

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Love it. Feels a bit retro, and pretty. I also have very long full hair and this fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is on the inside so I have to wear inside out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Head and hair were soaked at the end of shower. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: traveller57

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is the best shower cap !!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great.... I just loved it :) It looks so pretty, Inexpensive and it fulfills the purpose. This hot pink shower cap is thick and double layered with a lining inside. It completely covers my head. It dries quickly. The satin outside is of real good quality and over all the cap seems sturdy and should last for a while. I will definitely buy other colors too. I would highly recommend this shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: The honest Reviewer.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower cap! It is very durable, it will probably last forever. The pink with polka dots is adorable. The shower cap is roomy enough for a lot of hair, but the elastic band fits snug to keep your hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Marzluf
